text: HERES WHAT U NEED TO DO A.S.A.P----MANY OF THESE RALLYS ARE BEING ATTENDED BY ANARCHISTS PROTESTERS. DIFFERENCE OF POLITICAL OPINION IS ONE THING, DRESSING IN ALL BLACK, WITH FACE MASKS, AND CARRYING BLACK-RED, COMMIE FLAGS IS QUITE ANOTHER.!!! U NEED TO DESIGN A ===ANTI-ANARCHIST FLAG- !!! RED, WHITE, AND BLUE ON THE TOP, WITH A GIANT EAGLE FACE, AND THE BOTTOM HALF, BLACK, DEPICTING ANTI ANARCHIST-!!!! THEY COME IN MANY COLORS, DEPENDING ON THE GROUP THEY REPRESENT, BLACK & GREEN, ANARCHIST GREEN PARTY, BLACK& PINK , ANARCHIST L.G.B.T., WE NEED AN AMERICAN, ANTI ANARCHIST FLAG--DO IT, AND DO IT NOW, THEN PROM OTE IT, IT WILL BE BIG SELLER----MARK
